Goopt example program

goopt-example

NAME
SYNOPSIS
DESCRIPTION
OPTIONS

NAME

goopt-example − goopt demonstration program

SYNOPSIS

goopt-example [−v|−−verbose] [−−quiet] [−−color|−−colour [default|red|green|blue]] [−n|−−repeat 1] [−u|−−user User] [−−child name of child] [−−help]

DESCRIPTION

Example program for using the goopt flag library.

OPTIONS

−v,−−verbose

output verbosely

−−quiet

be quiet, instead

−−color,−−colour [default|red|green|blue]

determine the color of the output

−n,−−repeat 1

number of repetitions

−u,−−user User

name of user

−−child name of child

specify child of user

−−help

show usage message
